See the GNU Lesser General Public * License for more details. * * You should have received a copy of the GNU Lesser General Public * License along with this library; if not, write to the Free Software * Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor, Boston, MA 02110-1301, * USA. * * [Oracle and Java are registered trademarks of Oracle and/or its affiliates. * Other names may be trademarks of their respective owners.] * * ----------------------------- * DefaultKeyedValues2DTest.java * ----------------------------- * (C) Copyright 2003-2016 by Object Refinery Limited and Contributors. * * Original Author: David Gilbert (for Object Refinery Limited); * Contributor(s): -; * * Changes * ------- * 13-Mar-2003 : Version 1 (DG); * 15-Sep-2004 : Updated cloning test (DG); * 06-Oct-2005 : Added testEquals() (DG); * 18-Jan-2007 : Added testSparsePopulation() (DG); * 26-Feb-2007 : Added some basic tests (DG); * 30-Mar-2007 : Added a test for bug 1690654 (DG); * 21-Nov-2007 : Added testRemoveColumnByKey() method (DG); * */
